notes.text: We now suppress the call of the invalidate function on setShapeSelectionMode
We've now provided certain documentation updates for print changes
We've now provided an original JQuery event as a parameter in shapePress and shapeContextMenu event of Gantt
We now ensure that the shape selection is retained while clicking on an empty space with the CTRL key, if ShapeSelectionMode is either MultiWithKeyboard or MultiWithKeyboardAndLasso
